## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (9b8151e0e08bf0778b96894c1872fc04c922f94163d008a9f616fa2b71dae5bd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@c11-lib-ts/document-handler' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
